page.title: 19Games in the Playground.
page.content: In the playground we play different games in the {winter} and in the {summer}. In the winter we make a skiddy patch.We slide on and slip all over.If it has frozen overnight we find some ice,and stamp on it until it is slushy. Then we slide on it until it is very slippy. {Queenio Cocio} is a game we play in the winter to keep warm.In the summer the girls play {Elastics} and the boys play {Football} and {Cricket}. {Oliver Twist} is a game played with a small ball against a wall.As you throw this rhyme is chanted: Oliver Twist Can you do this If so do Touch your knee Touch your toe Bounce the ball and under you go.
